SourceString: But it seems like it can't be used now.
But I don't have enough MP!
Wow, {Character_Passive_Name} has come back to life!
But {Character_Passive_Name} did not come back to life.
But {Character_Passive_Name} doesn't seem to need it now.
Enveloped in sacred power, \nIt is now difficult to keep monsters at bay!
But there's nothing nearby to look at!
There is nothing suspicious... \nIt looks like a normal treasure chest.
A monster was hiding in the treasure chest! \nThe monster ran away!
Can I \n rewrite your whereabouts with new information? \n<yesno><break>
But since I'm on the dolboard, \nI can't pretend to be quiet!
